review:
Six months post-treatment, my oral health has significantly improved, and I'm thankful for Dr. Chandni's expertise.

I wanted to express my utmost gratitude for the exceptional care during my LANAP treatment. Your dedication to-words work and the well-being of your patients is truly remarkable. From the moment I walked into you made me to felt at ease and confident in line of treatment .

Your detailed explanation of the LANAP procedure and the compassionate manner in which you addressed my concerns were greatly appreciated. The treatment itself went smoothly, and I can already feel the positive impact ..

Your professionalism, patience, and the personalized care I received made a significant difference in my overall experience. I am thankful for your commitment to excellence in dentistry. 

I highly recommend Dr. Chandni for exceptional LANAP treatment and care

I met Dr. Chandini Garu at National Dental Care in Madinaguda, where I underwent a routine examination and two sessions of Laser Curettage procedure. I am truly pleased to have crossed paths with such a skilled and compassionate doctor. Her professionalism is evident as she took the time to meticulously elucidate each phase of the procedure. I extend my gratitude to Dr. Chandini Garu for the exceptional care and treatment I received.

Regards
Kishore Kalagotla
